o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Name: Check relationship join has parent and child attributes (MDDE)
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Creator: DijkC1
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:HelpMessage: This check ensures that a relationship has the parent and child attributes filled correctly.
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:OutputMessage: The following RelationshipJoins do not pass custom check:
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:CheckScript: Function %Check%(obj) %Check% = True If obj.ParentAttribute Is Nothing Then %Check% = False WriteError "Relationship: " & obj.RelationShip.DisplayName & " is missing a parent attribute." End If If obj.ChildAttribute Is Nothing Then %Check% = False WriteError "Relationship: " & obj.RelationShip.DisplayName & " is missing a child attribute for: " & obj.DisplayName End If End Function
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:AutoFixScrpt:
Function %Fix%(obj, outmsg) ' Implement your automatic correction on <obj> here ' filling <outmsg> as you wish ' and return True if successful.
outmsg = "Automatic correction not implemented"
%Fix% = False End Function
